Out favorite meal in a week of gastronomic excess.  Javier, the host/owner/waiter was just a hoot.  Very engaging.  Literally sits at your table to discuss the menu and whatever else comes to mind.  Food was truly amazing and a wonderful change from the plethora of tapas spots.  Everything we ate, we loved.  Started with specialty cocktails (tamarind margarita, grape martini) and chips with delicious spinach/artichoke dip.  Lamb carpaccio, mackerel sashimi, green papaya salad (outrageous), scallop dish (with "things" on top per Javier) were all great.  Standout was the pork dish with mushrooms that was as good a single dish as I have ever tasted.  Goat cheese cheesecake for dessert.  Wow!
